frameDefinitions: A group of Colonists from a Homeland migrate to and proceed to settle in a New_area.
A Perceiver determines the Location of a Sought_entity within a Ground.
A Terrorist commits a violent or otherwise harmful Act upon a Victim in order to coerce or terrorize a government or populace.
frameExamples: In the 7th century BC, Phoenicians <t>colonized</t> the eastern section of Libya.
Kim <t>found</t> his hat on the far side.
Their <t>terrorism</t> against civilians will not be tolerated.
listRoleDefinitions: A group of people who move together to an area outside their <fen>Homeland</fen> for the purpose of settling.
The <fen>Homeland</fen> is where the <fen>Colonists</fen> are originally from.
The <fen>Colonists</fen> move to the <fen>New_area</fen>, inhabiting it and (in the case of nation-states) extending the control of the <fen>Homeland</fen>.
The time at which the colonizing takes place.
The individual that determines the <fen>Location</fen> of the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> succeeds in finding.
The general set of entities that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> examined in order to find the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Sought_entity</fen> is located.
The <fen>Terrorist</fen> commits the <fen>Act</fen> of terror for political or ideological gains.
The <fen>Act</fen> is the harmful action performed by the <fen>Terrorist</fen> or terrorist organization.
The <fen>Victim</fen> is most directly affected or harmed by the <fen>Act</fen> of terrorism.
The location in time when the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
The location where the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Spain</fex> settled the northern areas of Mexico through the use of missions, civil settlements, and presidios.
Norse invaders in the 900s colonized <fex>the North Midlands</fex> more densely than any other part of England'
<fex>I</fex> finally found the peanut underneath the couch cusion.
Sam located the Imperial regal <fex>among the coins in his pocket</fex> and passed it to the boy.
Several domestic <fex>terrorists</fex> were operating from the site during the mid 1990s.
Many have suffered due to their acts of <fex><t>terrorism</t></fex>.
Cowardly acts of terrorism <fex>upon innocent men, women, and children</fex> is not a doorway to Heaven, but a gateway to Hell.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Saratoga County Board of Supervisors
Act for the Encouragement of Schools
the New York State Barge Canal
The Second Baptist Church of Halfmoon
